drug.name: Bordetella pertussis pertactin antigen
drug.description: Bordetella pertussis pertactin antigen is a vaccine for the prophylaxis of whooping cough that contains pertactin, a membrane-associated antigen of Bordetella pertussis [A31248].

article.citation: Pagliaccia C, Manetti R, Rappuoli R: Pertactin antigens extracted from Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella bronchiseptica differ in the isoelectric point. Arch Microbiol. 1997 Nov;168(5):437-40.

product.name: CLOSTRIDIUM TETANI TOXOID ANTIGEN (FORMALDEHYDE INACTIVATED), CORYNEBACTERIUM DIPHTHERIAE TOXOID ANTIGEN (FORMALDEHYDE INACTIVATED), BORDETELLA PERTUSSIS TOXOID ANTIGEN (GLUTARALDEHYDE INACTIVATED), BORDETELLA PERTUSSIS FILAMENTOUS HEMAGGLUTININ ANTIGEN (FORMALDEHYDE INACTIVATED), BORDETELLA PERTUSSIS PERTACTIN ANTIGEN, and BORDETELLA PERTUSSIS FIMBRIAE 2/3 ANTIGEN

mixture.name: Adacel TDaP TDaP
mixture.ingredients: Bordetella pertussis filamentous hemagglutinin antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Bordetella pertussis fimbriae 2/3 antigen + Bordetella pertussis pertactin antigen + Bordetella pertussis toxoid antigen (glutaraldehyde inactivated) + Clostridium tetani toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Corynebacterium diphtheriae toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated)

mixture.name: CLOSTRIDIUM TETANI TOXOID ANTIGEN (FORMALDEHYDE INACTIVATED), CORYNEBACTERIUM DIPHTHERIAE TOXOID ANTIGEN (FORMALDEHYDE INACTIVATED), BORDETELLA PERTUSSIS TOXOID ANTIGEN (GLUTARALDEHYDE INACTIVATED), BORDETELLA PERTUSSIS FILAMENTOUS HEMAGGLUTININ ANTIGEN (FORMALDEHYDE INACTIVATED), BORDETELLA PERTUSSIS PERTACTIN ANTIGEN, and BORDETELLA PERTUSSIS FIMBRIAE 2/3 ANTIGEN
mixture.ingredients: Bordetella pertussis filamentous hemagglutinin antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Bordetella pertussis fimbriae 2/3 antigen + Bordetella pertussis pertactin antigen + Bordetella pertussis toxoid antigen (glutaraldehyde inactivated) + Clostridium tetani toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Corynebacterium diphtheriae toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated)

mixture.name: Daptacel
mixture.ingredients: Bordetella pertussis filamentous hemagglutinin antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Bordetella pertussis fimbriae 2/3 antigen + Bordetella pertussis pertactin antigen + Bordetella pertussis toxoid antigen (glutaraldehyde inactivated) + Clostridium tetani toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Corynebacterium diphtheriae toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated)

mixture.name: Vaxelis
mixture.ingredients: Bordetella pertussis filamentous hemagglutinin antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Bordetella pertussis fimbriae 2/3 antigen + Bordetella pertussis pertactin antigen + Bordetella pertussis toxoid antigen (glutaraldehyde inactivated) + Clostridium tetani toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Corynebacterium diphtheriae toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Haemophilus influenzae type B capsular polysaccharide meningococcal outer membrane protein conjugate antigen + Hepatitis B Vaccine (Recombinant) + Poliovirus type 1 antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Poliovirus type 2 antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Poliovirus type 3 antigen (formaldehyde inactivated)

mixture.name: Adacel TDaP
mixture.ingredients: Bordetella pertussis filamentous hemagglutinin antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Bordetella pertussis fimbriae 2/3 antigen + Bordetella pertussis pertactin antigen + Bordetella pertussis toxoid antigen (glutaraldehyde inactivated) + Clostridium tetani toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Corynebacterium diphtheriae toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated)

mixture.name: Quadracel

mixture.name: Pentacel
mixture.ingredients: Bordetella pertussis filamentous hemagglutinin antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Bordetella pertussis fimbriae 2/3 antigen + Bordetella pertussis pertactin antigen + Bordetella pertussis toxoid antigen (glutaraldehyde inactivated) + Clostridium tetani toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Corynebacterium diphtheriae toxoid antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Haemophilus influenzae type B strain 1482 capsular polysaccharide tetanus toxoid conjugate antigen + Poliovirus type 1 antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Poliovirus type 2 antigen (formaldehyde inactivated) + Poliovirus type 3 antigen (formaldehyde inactivated)
